appetizers.name: Fried Plantains
appetizers.description: Our fried ripe plantains have a crispy, caramelized texture and an irresistibly sweet taste.

appetizers.name: Fish Cakes
appetizers.description: Tender flakes of fish mixed with butter, garlic, and potato, then coated with breadcrumbs and pan fried until golden.

appetizers.name: Jug-Jug
appetizers.description: Not sure about this one, either. Maybe two jugs?

mains.name: Cou-cou
mains.description: The national dish of Barbados when eaten with flying fish.

mains.name: Jug-Jug
mains.description: This again. Still don't know what it is.

mains.name: Fried Flying Fish
mains.description: Fresh flying fish fillets, fried frantically for five fortnights. Featuring fashionably fat french fries.

desserts.name: Corn Pie
desserts.description: This has onion in it, yet it's listed as a dessert. You can't explain that.

beverages.name: Water
beverages.description: Only the finest hydrogen and oxygen atoms, combined in the perfect ratio of 2:1.

beverages.name: Paw-Paw and Coconut Drink
beverages.description: We take a paw and combine it with another paw, for a total of two paws, then we throw in some coconut.
